Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openig.heap

Packages that use org.forgerock.openig.heap
org.forgerock.openig.filter Filters the requests and/or responses of HTTP exchanges. 
org.forgerock.openig.handler Handles HTTP exchange requests by generating responses. 
org.forgerock.openig.heap Manages collections or "heaps" of associated objects, initialized from declarative configuration artfiacts. 
org.forgerock.openig.io Provides stream buffering, branching, and storage functions. 
org.forgerock.openig.log Facility for logging and real-time performance monitoring. 
org.forgerock.openig.pbworks   
org.forgerock.openig.saml   
org.forgerock.openig.servlet Integrates with the Java Enterprise Edition Servlet API. 
 

Classes in org.forgerock.openig.heap used by org.forgerock.openig.filter
GenericHeaplet
          A generic base class for heaplets with automatically injected fields.
GenericHeapObject
          A generic base class for heap objects with handy injected heap objects.
HeapException
          An exception that is thrown during heap operations.
Heaplet
          Creates and initializes an object that is stored in a Heap.
NestedHeaplet
          A generic base class for a heaplet nested within the class it creates.
